title: Ilgich
description: Multiple fringes with warp-twined heading, warp-twined (LM) edge. Printed lining. Black wool ground with polychrome silk embroidery and cotton and silk fringes. There is a printed cotton backing, and a silk/cotton ikat edging on the reverse. Center square of large patterns with border on sides and bottom.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
